description.en:
Be careful what you ask for! You might end up with a headache like what the children from Karya Taruna school experienced. They are Rani, Grace, Kris, Roki, Michael, Eduardo, and Yuli. They were trapped by their own desires.

What if your parents turn into giant animals? See, the story, in the Fallen Beast comic.

Their intentions were to ask their parents not to be nagging and to be attentive, but instead they turned into giant animals. I don't know what's wrong with their wish or the shooting star, right? The problem is that they said their wish just as the shooting star arrived.

Chaos was inevitable! People thought that the beast was a real animal. In fact, they were humans transformed. Animal protection officers came to arrest the animals.

As it turned out, the animal protection officers were just pretending to be good. Actually, they were capturing rare animals for sale! How dangerous is that?

(Source: Goodreads, MTL)
description.id:
Hati-hati sama apa yang kamu minta! Bisa-bisa malah bikin kamu repot dan pusing tujuh keliling seperti yang dialami anak-anak dari sekolah Karya Taruna. Mereka adalah Rani, Grace, Kris, Roki, Michael, Eduardo, dan Yuli. Mereka terjebak oleh keinginan sendiri.

Bagaimana kalo orang tuamu berubah menjadi binatang raksasa? Lihat, kisahnya, di komik Binatang Jatuh.

Maksud hati, sih, mereka memohon supaya para orang tua itu enggak bawel jadi penuh perhatian, eh malah berubah jadi binatang raksasa. Entah apa yang salah dengan keinginan mereka atau bintang jatuhnya, yah? Soalnya mereka ngucapin keinginan itu pas banget saat bintang jatuh itu tiba.

Kekacauan pun enggak bisa dihindari lagi! Orang-orang mengira kalau binatang itu memang binatang sungguhan. Padahal binatang itu kan manusia yang berubah wujud. Petugas dari pelindungan satwa pun datang untuk menangkap binatang-binatang itu.

Ternyata, para petugas perlindungan satwa itu hanya pura-pura berkelakuan baik. Sebenarnya, mereka menangkap binatang langka untuk dijual! Wah, bahaya, dong?

(Sumber: Goodreads)
